summary.span: 定义连接点对象，该对象允许服务器控件作为使用者，以建立与提供者的连接。

span.span: Defines a connection point object that enables a server control acting as a consumer to form a connection with a provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在两个服务器控件之间的每个 Web 部件连接，每个控件必须具有 （以及其他要求） 关联的连接点对象，使它可连接到另一个控件并可提供或使用数据，具体取决于是否控件指定为提供程序或连接的使用者。In every Web Parts connection between two server controls, each control must have (among other requirements) an associated connection point object that enables it to connect to the other control and to either provide or consume data, depending on whether the control is designated as the provider or consumer for the connection. A对象通常包含控件可以如何连接到另一个控件，它可以共享的数据的类型的详细信息。A object in general contains the details for how a control can connect to another control and the type of data it can share. 对于作为连接中的使用者的控件，其连接点必须是对象。For a control acting as the consumer in a connection, its connection point must be a object. Web 部件连接和连接点上的信息，请参阅下面的另请参阅部分中列出的主题。For details on Web Parts connections and connection points, read the topics listed in the See Also section below. 若要创建对象，将需要执行几个步骤：To create a object, several steps are required: 1. 允许使用者控件引用接口实例。Enable a consumer control to reference an interface instance. A或其他服务器控件 (将添加到的服务器任何的控件类型区域可用) 必须能够使用的特定接口实例的数据。A or other server control (any type of server control that will be added to a zone can be used) must be able to consume data from a specific interface instance. 控件不需要实现接口，;仅提供程序必须实现它。The control need not implement the interface; only the provider must implement it. 使用者也可以使用确切的接口类型提供程序提供服务; 如果不是，请对象可以用于将数据从提供程序的接口类型的使用者理解的类型转换。The consumer can either work with the exact interface type served by a provider or, if it does not, a object can be used to transform data from a provider's interface type to a type understood by the consumer. 启用使用者的典型方法是声明一个私有字段以包含所需的接口类型的引用。A typical way to enable a consumer is to declare a private field to contain a reference to the desired interface type. 2. 标识一个回调方法。Identify a callback method. 使用者中的方法必须标识为要与该提供程序建立连接的回调方法。A method in the consumer must be identified as the callback method to establish a connection with the provider. 此方法检索提供程序实现，并将分配它给 （例如） 该私有字段创建第一步中接口的实例。This method retrieves an instance of the interface that the provider implements, and assigns it to (for example) the private field created in the first step. 标识使用者中的回调方法的 Web 部件方法是将添加`ConnectionConsumer`元数据属性 (由定义类) 到接收接口实例的方法。The Web Parts approach for identifying a callback method in the consumer is to add a `ConnectionConsumer` metadata attribute (defined by the class) to the method that receives the interface instance. 添加属性后，所需的唯一参数是要使用的使用者连接点的显示名称。When the attribute is added, the only required parameter is a display name to use for the consumer connection point. 此外可添加可选参数，例如 id。Optional parameters can also be added, such as an ID. 3. 进程和输出接口实例中的数据。Process and output the data from the interface instance. 根据需要对数据执行任何内部处理，然后通常使用者控件将呈现到页的数据。Perform any internal processing as needed on the data, and then typically a consumer control will render the data to the page. 执行此操作的常用方法是重写控件的方法。A common way of doing this is to override the control's method. > [!NOTE] > 在过程中发出同步请求，使用者应请求数据直接从提供程序期间或之后事件。During a synchronous request, a consumer should request data directly from the provider during or immediately after the event. 过程的异步请求，如果在呈现过程中，将提供程序的回调方法未调用的任意位置开发人员可以假定已向使用者发送任何数据。During an asynchronous request, if the provider's callback method is not called at any point during rendering, the developer can assume that no data was sent to the consumer. 控件具有已配置为使用者后，该控件可以参与 （假设，提供者控件也配置并且可用） 的连接。After a control has been equipped to act as a consumer, the control can participate in connections (assuming that a provider control is also equipped and available). 若要创建的网页上的标记的静态声明性的连接，开发人员可以使用``元素。To create a static, declarative connection in the markup of a Web page, developers can use the `` element. 如果`ConnectionConsumer`标识回叫方法的使用者源代码中的属性指定的 ID 的连接点，则该值必须分配给`ConsumerConnectionPointID`属性中``页面上的元素。If the `ConnectionConsumer` attribute in the consumer source code that identifies the callback method specifies an ID for the connection point, then that value must be assigned to the `ConsumerConnectionPointID` attribute in the `` element on a page. 开发人员可能会指定一个使用者连接点的 ID 的原因是在使用者控件中定义的多个连接点。A reason that a developer might specify an ID for a consumer connection point is if there are multiple connection points defined in the consumer control. 如果为使用者控件中的使用者连接点不指定 ID，值没有要分配给`ConsumerConnectionPointID`属性页中，因为将使用从获取的默认值创建连接字段。If an ID is not specified for the consumer connection point in the consumer control, a value does not have to be assigned to the `ConsumerConnectionPointID` attribute in the page either, because the connection will be created using a default value obtained from the field. 若要在代码中创建的连接，开发人员必须创建一个新对象通过调用方法并传递到该使用者控件，以及的 ID 或索引定义的 ID使用者控件中的对象。To create a connection in code, developers must create a new object by calling the method and passing to it the ID of the consumer control, along with the ID or index of the defined object in the consumer control. 返回对象，对使用者控件的引用以及对提供程序控件和相应的引用对象，都传递给方法来创建一个新对象。The returned object, along with a reference to the consumer control, a reference to the provider control, and a corresponding object, are all passed to the method to create a new object. 开发人员可以使用使用者连接点，以声明方式或以编程方式建立连接的一部分，但用户可以与使用者连接点建立连接通过用户界面 (UI) 还进行交互。Although developers can use consumer connection points as part of establishing connections either declaratively or programmatically, users can also interact with consumer connection points to establish connections through the user interface (UI). 如果开发人员声明控件在网页上，它提供对用户创建连接的运行时用户界面。If developers declare a control on a Web page, it provides a run-time UI for users to create connections. 如果用户选择提供程序控制通过单击建立连接的起始点作为其连接谓词 （它们还可以选择使用者; 没有任何区别中生成连接），在 UI 中，他们将看到具有的下拉列表控件显示可用使用者连接点 （或如果有多个快照的点） 的名称提供程序可以发送到的数据。If users choose the provider control as the starting point for establishing the connection by clicking its connect verb (they could also choose the consumer; there is no difference in the resulting connection), in the UI they will see a drop-down list control with the display names of the available consumer connection point (or points if there are multiple ones) that the provider can send the data to. 用户必须选择要建立连接的使用者连接点。Users must select a consumer connection point to establish a connection. A对象将直接与一个特定的使用者控件相关联，并将连接的详细信息存储在继承自基类的属性类。A object associates directly with a specific consumer control, and stores details about a connection in the properties it inherits from the base class. 例如，在继承属性，使用者连接点保存的界面，它使用的类型。For example, in the inherited property, a consumer connection point keeps the type of interface it uses. 如果提供程序和连接中的使用者同时了解接口类型，这些控件是兼容并能够建立直接连接。If the provider and consumer in a connection both understand the interface type, the controls are compatible and capable of forming a direct connection. 如果提供程序和使用者不能具有相同的接口类型，它们是不兼容，并且必须使用要转换的提供程序连接点对象到使用者可以使用的类型的属性。If the provider and consumer cannot work with the same interface type, they are incompatible and must use a object to translate the provider connection point's property into a type that the consumer can work with. 另一个重要的继承的属性是属性，它提供一个友好名称以显示在 UI 中供用户从中选择的使用者连接点时创建连接。Another important inherited property is the property, which provides a friendly name to display in the UI for users to choose a consumer connection point when creating connections. 显示名称是必需的参数，开发人员添加时`ConnectionConsumer`属性设为使用者控件中的回调方法。The display name is the required parameter when developers add a `ConnectionConsumer` attribute to the callback method in a consumer control. 继承属性也十分有用，因为上述，由于其提供的唯一标识符的使用者连接点的事件中使用者具有多个连接点。The inherited property is also useful, as indicated above, because it provides a unique identifier for a consumer connection point in the event that a consumer has multiple connection points. 使用者可以有多个对象定义中，然后在此情况下，当开发人员将添加`ConnectionConsumer`属性到方法时，它们应指定一个要区分每个连接点的 ID 值。A consumer can have multiple objects defined in it, and in this case, when developers add the `ConnectionConsumer` attribute to a method, they should specify an ID value to distinguish each connection point. 另一个值得注意的继承的属性是属性，它指示使用者连接点是否可以同时连接到多个提供程序。One other notable inherited property is the property, which indicates whether a consumer connection point can connect simultaneously to multiple providers. 此属性值是`false`默认情况下，使用者连接点 (而它默认为`true`提供程序连接点)。This property value is `false` by default for consumer connection points (whereas it defaults to `true` for provider connection points). 类会将多个唯一的方法添加到成员它继承自类。The class adds several unique methods to the members it inherits from the class. 方法将调用者自身定义回调方法，以从提供程序检索接口实例。The method invokes the consumer's own defined callback method to retrieve the interface instance from the provider. 方法返回一个布尔值，该值指示连接点是否能够建立连接，基于关联的使用者控件的当前状态。The method returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the connection point is able to establish connections, based on the current state of the associated consumer control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式创建连接，以编程方式，或通过用户界面，每种情况中都使用使用者连接点的简单。The following code example shows simple ways to create a connection declaratively, programmatically, or through the UI, in each case making use of a consumer connection point. 该示例包含四个部分：The example has four parts: - 用户控件，使你能够更改 Web 部件页面上显示模式。A user control that enables you to change the Web Parts display mode on a page. - 源接口和两个代码控制充当提供程序和连接的使用者。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 网页上承载的控件和运行的代码示例。A Web page to host all the controls and run the code example. - 如何运行该示例页的说明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 此代码示例的第一部分是使用户能够更改在网页上的显示模式的用户控件。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 将以下源代码保存到一个.ascx 文件中，将其分配到的文件名称`Src`属性`Register`指令为此用户控件，即托管的 Web 页面顶部附近。Save the following source code to an .ascx file, giving it the file name that is assigned to the `Src` attribute of the `Register` directive for this user control, which is near the top of the hosting Web page. 有关详细信息显示在此控件模式和源代码的说明，请参见[演练： 在 Web 部件页面上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#6)] 下面的代码示例的第二部分是接口和控件的源代码。The second part of the code example is the source code for the interface and controls. 源文件包含名为一个简单的界面`IZipCode`。The source file contains a simple interface named `IZipCode`. 此外，还有类名为`ZipCodeWebPart`，实现接口，并充当提供程序控制。There is also a class named `ZipCodeWebPart` that implements the interface and acts as the provider control. 其他类命名为`WeatherWebPart`，并且它可作为连接的使用者。The other class is named `WeatherWebPart`, and it acts as the consumer for the connection. 此类具有一个名为方法`GetZipCode`获取的实例`IZipCode`从提供者控件的接口。This class has a method named `GetZipCode` that gets an instance of the `IZipCode` interface from the provider control. 请注意，此方法作为使用者的连接点方法标记为`ConnectionConsumer`其元数据中的属性。Note that this method is marked as the consumer's connection point method with a `ConnectionConsumer` attribute in its metadata. 这是用于标识使用者控件中的连接点方法的机制。This is the mechanism for identifying the connection point method in the consumer control. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 你可以显式编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将动态编译运行时将源代码。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 下面的代码示例的第三部分是网页。The third part of the code example is the Web page. 顶部附近是`Register`指令用于注册构成该连接，自定义控件和用户控件，使用户能够更改显示在页面上的模式。Near the top are `Register` directives to register the custom controls that form the connection, and the user control that enables users to change display modes on the page. 以声明方式内创建连接本身``页面上的元素。The connection itself is created declaratively within the `` element on the page. 此示例演示创建连接的一种方式-注意`ConsumerConnectionPointID`属性中``元素。This demonstrates one way of creating a connection--note the `ConsumerConnectionPointID` attribute in the `` element. 你还可以以编程方式; 创建连接有关执行此操作的代码位于`Button1_Click`方法。You can also create the connection programmatically; the code for doing that is in the `Button1_Click` method. 在这种情况下，创建对象，然后传递到创建实际的连接的方法。In this case, a object is created and then passed to a method that creates the actual connection. 是否以声明方式或以编程方式创建连接，连接点必须始终指定与提供程序和使用者。Whether the connection is created declaratively or programmatically, connection points must always be specified for both the provider and the consumer. `Button2_Click`方法访问对象提供程序和使用者，并将其属性值的一些写入到页中的标签。The `Button2_Click` method accesses the objects for both the provider and the consumer, and writes some of their property values to a label in the page. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/CS/connectionPointCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/VB/connectionPointVB.aspx#1)] 加载浏览器中后，单击**连接点详细信息**按钮。After you load the page in a browser, click the **Connection Point Details** button. 显示有关在声明性的连接中建立的提供程序和使用者连接点的信息。Information about the provider and consumer connection points established in the declarative connection appears. 接下来，使用**显示模式**下拉列表控件切换到页连接模式。Next, use the **Display Mode** drop-down control to switch the page into connect mode. 上的谓词菜单**ZIP 代码提供程序**控件 （由标题栏中的向下箭头），单击连接谓词。On the verbs menu of the **ZIP Code Provider** control (represented by a downward arrow in the title bar), click the connect verb. 自动创建用户界面出现，连接``页面中声明的控件。The connection UI appears, created automatically by the `` control declared in the page. 这是另一种创建连接 （通过用户界面），以及前面所述的声明性和编程方法。This is another way of creating a connection (through the UI), along with the declarative and programmatic methods discussed earlier. 单击**断开连接**按钮以终止现有的静态连接。Click the **Disconnect** button to terminate the existing static connection. 单击**创建使用者连接**链接。Click the **Create a Connection to a Consumer** link. UI 现在显示一个下拉列表控件，其中列出了使用者连接点的显示名称。The UI now displays a drop-down control that lists the consumer connection point display name. 在下拉列表中，选择连接点，然后单击**连接**以完成连接。Select the connection point in the drop-down list, and then click **Connect** to complete the connection. 接下来，单击**断开连接**试。Next, click **Disconnect** again. 单击**动态连接**按钮以编程方式创建连接。Click the **Dynamic Connection** button to create a connection programmatically. 使用**显示模式**控件来返回到浏览模式的页。Use the **Display Mode** control to return the page to browse mode. 单击**连接点详细信息**按钮再次，指示有关的详细信息的使用者连接点对象一次的详细信息。Click the **Connection Point Details** button again, to indicate details about the consumer connection point object once more. 此示例已经演示了建立的连接和以下三种方式使用使用者连接点： 网页标记; 中声明静态连接在使用的代码中创建的连接对象和通过连接 UI 用户创建的连接。The example has demonstrated establishing a connection and using a consumer connection point in three ways: a static connection declared in the Web page markup; a connection created in code that used a object; and a connection created by a user through the connection UI.

MemberSignature.Value: public ConsumerConnectionPoint (System.Reflection.MethodInfo callbackMethod, Type interfaceType, Type controlType, string displayName, string id, bool allowsMultipleConnections);

Public Sub New (callbackMethod As MethodInfo, interfaceType As Type, controlType As Type, displayName As String, id As String, allowsMultipleConnections As Boolean)

public: ConsumerConnectionPoint(System::Reflection::MethodInfo ^ callbackMethod, Type ^ interfaceType, Type ^ controlType, System::String ^ displayName, System::String ^ id, bool allowsMultipleConnections);
new System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint : System.Reflection.MethodInfo * Type * Type * string * string * bool -> System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint
MemberSignature.Usage: new System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint (callbackMethod, interfaceType, controlType, displayName, id, allowsMultipleConnections)

param.name: callbackMethod
param.span: 使用者控件中的方法，该方法将接口实例返回给使用者以建立连接。

span.span: The method in the consumer control that returns an interface instance to consumers to establish a connection.

param.name: interfaceType
param.span: 使用者从提供者接收的接口的 。

span.span: The of the interface that the consumer receives from a provider.

param.name: controlType
param.span: 使用者连接点所关联的使用者控件的 。

span.span: The of the consumer control with which the consumer connection point is associated.

param.name: displayName
param.span: 在连接用户界面 (UI) 中向用户显示的使用者连接点的友好显示名称。

span.span: A friendly display name for the consumer connection point that appears to users in the connection user interface (UI).

param.name: id
param.span: 使用者连接点的唯一标识符。

span.span: A unique identifier for the consumer connection point.

param.name: allowsMultipleConnections
param.span: 一个布尔值，指示使用者连接点是否可同时拥有与提供者的多个连接。

span.span: A Boolean value indicating whether the consumer connection point can have multiple simultaneous connections with providers.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数类只需调用基构造函数，传递到它的各种参数，并初始化的基类。The constructor for the class simply calls the base constructor, passing to it the various parameters and initializing the base class. 基类构造函数检查大量的连接点的参数，并可能会引发几个例外。The base class constructor checks a number of the parameters for a connection point and can throw several exceptions. 有关可能的异常的列表，请参阅异常部分。For a list of possible exceptions, see the Exceptions section. 你可以调用构造函数来创建你自己的实例类。You can call the constructor to create your own instance of the class. 但是，在你所在只需建立的连接并不扩展类的情况下，应调用方法从提供程序返回连接点对象。However, in cases where you are simply establishing a connection and not extending the class, you should call the method to return a connection point object from a provider. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从派生类来创建自定义提供程序连接点。The following code example demonstrates how to derive from the class to create a custom provider connection point. 代码示例包含三个部分：The code example has three parts: - 包含提供程序的源文件控制，请使用者控制和自定义对象。A source file that contains a provider control, a consumer control, and a custom object. - 承载静态连接中的控件的网页。A Web page that hosts the controls in a static connection. - 如何运行此代码示例的说明。An explanation of how to run the example code. 下面的代码示例的第一部分是提供程序和使用者的源控件和自定义名为的类`TableConsumerConnectionPoint`。The first part of the code example is the source for the provider and consumer controls, and a custom class, named `TableConsumerConnectionPoint`. 请注意，构造函数的`TableConsumerConnectionPoint`类调用基构造函数，将其传递所需的参数，如参数部分中所示。Note that the constructor of the `TableConsumerConnectionPoint` class calls the base constructor, passing it the required parameters as indicated in the Parameters section. 此外请注意，在`TableConsumer`类，`SetConnectionInterface`方法指定为连接的回调方法和`ConnectionConsumer`属性声明自定义`TableConsumerConnectionPoint`作为参数。Also note that in the `TableConsumer` class, the `SetConnectionInterface` method is specified as the callback method for connections, and the `ConnectionConsumer` attribute declares the custom `TableConsumerConnectionPoint` as a parameter. 此示例演示如何创建自定义使用者连接点，然后将其与使用者控件相关联。This demonstrates how to create a custom consumer connection point and then associate it with a consumer control. 此示例假定，时动态编译的源代码，因此应将源代码文件放在 Web 应用程序的 App_Code 子文件夹。This example assumes that the source code is dynamically compiled, so you should place the source code file in an App_Code subfolder of your Web application. [!code-csharp[UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint/CS/connectionControls.cs#1)] 下面的代码示例的第二部分是承载在静态 Web 部件连接中的自定义控件的网页。The second part of the code example is the Web page that hosts the custom controls in a static Web parts connection. 页的顶部是`Register`指令，用于声明一个前缀和自定义控件的命名空间。At the top of the page is a `Register` directive to declare a prefix and the namespace for the custom controls. 使用声明连接``元素，提供程序和使用者的控件中声明``元素。The connection is declared by using an `` element, and the provider and consumer controls are declared within an `` element. [!code-aspx-csharp[UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint/CS/defaultcs.aspx#3)] 加载浏览器中的页。Load the page in a browser. 已在控件之间的连接存在，并且使用者显示的数据从提供程序，因为连接被声明为页中的静态连接。The connection between the controls already exists, and the consumer displays the data from the provider, because the connection was declared as a static connection in the page.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void SetObject (System.Web.UI.Control control, object data);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetObject(class System.Web.UI.Control control, object data) cil managed

abstract member SetObject : System.Web.UI.Control * obj -> unit override this.SetObject : System.Web.UI.Control * obj -> unit

param.name: control
param.span: 与使用者连接点相关联的使用者控件。

span.span: The consumer control associated with a consumer connection point.

param.name: data
param.span: 从提供者控件返回的接口实例。

span.span: The interface instance returned from a provider control.

summary.span: 调用使用者控件中的回调方法，并从提供者控件检索接口实例。

span.span: Invokes the callback method in a consumer control and retrieves the interface instance from a provider control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法从提供程序包含数据的使用者控件接收接口实例。This method receives an interface instance from a provider that contains data for the consumer control. 方法由调用对象时连接正在激活。The method is called by objects when a connection is being activated. 这是一个是初始化的连接和启用共享数据的两个控件的一部分的关键步骤。This is a critical step that is part of initiating a connection and enabling two controls to share data. 连接中的使用者控件必须能够使用相同类型的接口作为提供程序。The consumer control in a connection must be able to work with the same type of interface as the provider. 如果不存在，会不兼容的控件和对象必须用于建立连接。If it does not, the controls are incompatible and a object must be used to establish a connection.

span.span: is .

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool SupportsConnection(class System.Web.UI.Control control, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionInterfaceCollection secondaryInterfaces) cil managed

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法的实现始终返回`true`在所有情况下，对于类。The method as implemented always returns `true` in all cases for the class. 此方法的目的是让该状态检查`control`和`secondaryInterfaces`的某些关键点，以确定是否对象是目前能够创建的连接。The intent for this method is to have it check on the state of `control` and `secondaryInterfaces` at certain critical points to determine whether a object is presently able to create a connection. 可以有方案其中`control`处于状态可能会使其无法建立连接，或在何处`secondaryInterfaces`可以建立连接之前，必须存在。There can be scenarios where `control` is in a state that would make it impossible to form a connection, or where `secondaryInterfaces` must exist before a connection can be formed. 在这种情况下，开发人员可以继承类，并重写方法，提供用于确定何时准备好支持连接的连接点的自定义实现。In such cases, developers can inherit from the class, and override the method, providing a custom implementation to determine when the connection point is ready to support connections.
